Package visidia.simulation

Class Summary
Console Console is the simulator main class.
SimulationConstants This class defines several simulation constants.
SimulationConstants.Messages This class handles constants relative to messages.
SimulationConstants.PropertyStatus The Class PropertyStatus.
SimulationConstants.RunningMode This class handles constants relative to running mode.
VisidiaThreadGroup VisidiaThreadGroup is a thread group in visidia simulation mode.
 

Enum Summary
SimulationConstants.SimulationStatus The SimulationStatus enumeration.
SimulationConstants.SimulationType The SimulationType enumeration.
 

Error Summary
SimulationAbortError An error that is thrown when an aborted thread try to access simulation API.
